Desc.eng: Well, well, my friend! Do you have something for me? I’m still willing to pay… 1500 gold!
I fear that this substance will never wash off… but here you are.
I'm going to use this substance and forge a new weapon. See me later if you are interested.
I find your reward insufficient. I’d rather keep this substance for myself.
Monster hunters! You can’t trust these folks at all.
I found it, my friend… but I don’t have it any more.
Monster hunters! You can’t trust these folks at all.
